sentences.en: A farmer is entitled to a certain particularized tax treatment.
sentences.cn: 农民能够得到某种具体的税收待遇。

sentences.en: As part of the treatment, he attended 15 weeks of after-care.
sentences.cn: 作为治疗的一部分，他接受了15个星期的病后护理。

sentences.en: Buck up your ideas or you'll get more of the same treatment.
sentences.cn: 打起精神来，否则你会吃更多苦头。

sentences.en: He has a simplistic view of the treatment of eczema.
sentences.cn: 他对湿疹治疗的看法过于简单化。

sentences.en: He was admitted yesterday for treatment of blood clots in his lungs.
sentences.cn: 他昨天入院治疗肺部的血块。

sentences.en: Her hair started falling out as a result of radiation treatment.
sentences.cn: 由于放疗，她开始掉头发。

sentences.en: Homeopathic treatment is based on the "like cures like" principle.
sentences.cn: 顺势疗法是基于“以毒攻毒”的原理。

sentences.en: I estimate that the total cost for treatment will be $12,500.
sentences.cn: 我估计治疗费用总共会有12,500美元。

sentences.en: It was hard to say why the man deserved such shabby treatment.
sentences.cn: 真搞不懂为什么这个人就该受到如此不公正的待遇。

sentences.en: Just lately, Kyra has been giving me the silent treatment (= refusing to speak to me because she is angry with me ) .
sentences.cn: 就在最近，凯拉一直对我不理不睬。

sentences.en: Mild jaundice in the newborn is common and often clears without treatment.
sentences.cn: 新生儿有轻微的黄疸较为常见，经常不需要治疗就能自愈。

sentences.en: People must be satisfied that the treatment is safe.
sentences.cn: 人们必须确信这种治疗方法是安全的。

sentences.en: The earlier the treatment is given, the better the patient's chances.
sentences.cn: 病人越早接受治疗，康复的可能性就越大。

sentences.en: The hotel's new Spa offers every kind of rejuvenating treatment and therapy.
sentences.cn: 这个酒店新的温泉疗养区提供各种养生护理和诊疗服务。

sentences.en: The treatment involves the placement of twenty-two electrodes in the inner ear.
sentences.cn: 这一治疗需要在内耳放置22个电极。

sentences.en: There have been great advances in the treatment of cancer.
sentences.cn: 癌症治疗有了很大的进展。

sentences.en: We'll give her some VIP treatment and roll out the red carpet.
sentences.cn: 我们将给予她贵宾级礼遇，并且为她铺设红地毯。

综合治理；综合治疗；综合处理

trans.tran_en: something that is done to cure someone who is injured or ill
